Name: LU 479 - Zoning, 95 Horatio St, Manhattan (M 840260 (E) ZMM)
Title: Resolution approving with modifications the decision of the City Planning Commission on Application No. M 840260 (E) ZMM for the modification of Restrictive Declaration D-93, which was previously approved as part of an application for a Zoning Map amendment (M 840260 ZMM), to remove certain use restrictions and marketing requirements on property located at 95 Horatio Street (Block 643, Lot 1), in a C6-2A District, Borough of Manhattan, Community District 2 (the “Project Site”) (L.U. No. 479).

History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee with Modifications
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.
History.AgendaNote: Approved with Modifications and Coupled on GO

\b By Council Members Greenfield and Richards\b0\par
\par
   \tab WHEREAS, Restrictive Declaration D-93 dates from April 13, 1984, and was enacted in\par
connection with an approval for a Zoning Map amendment (M 840260 ZMM), sponsored by the\par
Rockrose Development Corporation and affecting a nearby two-block area bounded by\par
Gansevoort, Washington, W. 12th and West streets. This action generally changed the zoning\par
designation on these two blocks from M1-5 and C8-4 districts to a C6-2A District;\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, as mitigation of potentially significant adverse impacts resulting from the rezoning a Restrictive Declaration (D-93) (the \ldblquote Original Declaration\rdblquote ) was imposed on the Project Site, providing that the use of the Project Site is limited to certain commercial and light manufacturing uses defined in Section 15-58 of the New York City Zoning Resolution. The declaration obligates the owner of these properties to maintain space for meat-related uses contained in Use Groups 17A and 17B and, in the event of a vacancy, to use best efforts to rent to such uses;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx5877\tab\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on September 9\super th\nosupersub , 2016 its decision dated September 7\super th\nosupersub , 2016 (the "Decision"), on the application submitted by 95-97 Horatio LLC, for modification of the Original Declaration to remove the use restrictions and permit all uses allowed under zoning regulations with the exception of nightclub uses, for the Project Site (ULURP No. M 780389 (B) ZSK) (the "Application");\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council, as the successor in jurisdiction to the New York City board of Estimate, pursuant to the terms of the Original Declaration;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on November 21, 2016; \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use implications and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; \par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including were analyzed in Technical Memorandum #003, dated April 8, 2016. Technical Memorandum #004, dated September 2, 2016, the Negative Declaration issued on April 11, 2016; and the Revised Negative Declaration issued on September 7, 2016 (together the \ldblquote Environmental Analysis\rdblquote ),\par
\par
RESOLVED:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\cf1\expndtw-5 The Council finds that the action described herein will have \expndtw-4 no significant impact on the environment as set forth in the Environmental Analysis.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\cf0\expndtw0\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj Pursuant to Original Declaration and on the basis of the Decision and Application,\f1  \f0 M 840260 (E) ZMM, incorporated by reference herein, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in this report, the Council approves the Decision with the following modifications and subject to the following conditions:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx90\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-630\li720\qj\tx90\tx720 1.\tab Development pursuant to this resolution shall be in accordance with the terms of the First Amendment to Declaration with the modifications made by the Council attached hereto and made part hereof;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\li720\qj\tx90\tx720\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-630\li720\qj\tx90\tx720 2.\tab Development pursuant to this resolution shall only be permitted after such First Amendment to Declaration as modified is executed by 95-97 Horatio LLC, or its successors, and has been recorded and filed on the Project Site in the Office of the Register of the City of New York, County of Kings.\par

FIRST AMENDMENT TO DECLARATION\kerning28\ulnone\b0\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi1440\sa240\sl360\slmult1\kerning0 THIS FIRST AMENDMENT TO DECLARATION (the \ldblquote\ul Amended Declaration\ulnone\rdblquote ), made this 21st day of  November, 2016 by 95-97 HORATIO LLC, a Delaware limited liability company with offices c/o TF Cornerstone Inc., 387 Park Avenue South, New York, New York, 10016 (hereinafter called the \ldblquote\ul Declarant\ulnone\rdblquote ). \par
\pard\ltrpar\sa240\qc\kerning28\b WITNESSETH:\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi1440\sa240\sl360\slmult1\kerning0 WHEREAS\b0 , Declarant is the owner in fee simple of certain real property located in the Borough of Manhattan, City and State of New York, Block 643, Lot 1, which property is designated as 95 Horatio Street and described in \ul Exhibit A\ulnone  annexed hereto (the \ldblquote\ul Subject Property\ulnone\rdblquote ); \par
\b WHEREAS\b0 , the Subject Property is the subject of a Declaration (D-93) dated April 13, 1984, executed by West Coast Company c/o Rockrose Development Corporation, Declarant\rquote s predecessor-in-title to the Subject Property, filed in Office of the Register of the City of New York, New York County at Reel 818, Page 1139 (the \ldblquote\ul Declaration\ulnone\rdblquote ); \par
\b WHEREAS\b0 , the Declaration was executed and recorded in connection with an application to the New York City Planning Commission (\ldblquote\ul CPC\ulnone\rdblquote ) for a rezoning (the \ldblquote\ul Rezoning\ulnone\rdblquote ) of the Subject Property from M1-5 to C6-2A (Application No. C 840260 ZMM) and an application for a zoning text amendment (Application No. C 840235 ZRY); \par
\b WHEREAS\b0 , the Declaration required Declarant and its successors to maintain a portion of the Subject Property for a \ldblquote Permitted Use\rdblquote  (as defined in the Declaration and set forth in \ldblquote Exhibit D\rdblquote  annexed thereto), required Declarant to use \ldblquote best efforts\rdblquote  to maintain such portion of the Subject Property for meat-related Use Group 17A and 17B uses, and, in the event the spaces were to become vacant, to use best efforts to rent such uses; \par
\b WHEREAS,\b0  in conjunction with the Rezoning, additional restrictive declarations (D-94, D-95 and D-96; collectively, the \ldblquote\ul Other Declarations\ulnone\rdblquote ) were recorded against three properties other than the Subject Property and similarly restricted the permitted uses at these sites; \par
\b WHEREAS,\b0  a number of applications have been filed to modify the Other Declarations, including application numbers M 840260(A) ZMM (filed January 24, 1995), M 840260(B) ZMM (filed July 24, 1997), and M 840260(C) ZMM (filed October 2, 1998);\par
\b WHEREAS\b0 , Declarant desires to amend the Declaration by eliminating the use restrictions on the Subject Property, other than the prohibition on eating and drinking establishments with dancing (i.e., night clubs), and filed an application with the CPC under application number M 8\uldb 40\ulnone 260(E) ZMM; \par
\b WHEREAS,\b0  Section 4.05 of the Declaration provides that it may be amended or cancelled only upon application by the Declarant (or any successor in interest) and by approval of the City Planning Commission and the City Council, and that no other legal approval or consent from any public body, private person or legal entity of any kind shall be required;\par
\b WHEREAS\b0 , CPC approved the application on September 7, 2016; \par
\pard\ltrpar\fi1440\sb240\sl360\slmult1\qj\b WHEREAS\b0 , Madison Title Agency, LLC, agent for Old Republic National Title Insurance Company, has certified that, as of March 21, 2016, the sole \ldblquote Parties-in-Interest\rdblquote  (as defined in subdivision (f) of the definition of the term \ldblquote zoning lot\rdblquote  in Section 12-10 of the Zoning Resolution) in the Subject Property are set forth in the certification attached to this Amended Declaration as \ul Exhibit B\ulnone  (each a \ldblquote\ul Party-in-Interest\ulnone\rdblquote );\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi1440\sb240\sa240\sl360\slmult1\qj\b WHEREAS\b0 , all Parties-in-Interest have either executed this Amended Declaration or waived their rights to execute this Amended Declaration by written instruments in substantially the same form as the waiver, annexed hereto as \ul Exhibit C\ulnone , which instruments are intended to be recorded simultaneously with this Amended Declaration; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi1440\sa240\sl360\slmult1\b WHEREAS\b0 , Declarant represents and warrants that, except for a mortgage held by Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, as trustee, no restrictions of record on the use of the Subject Property, nor any present or presently existing estate or interest in the Subject Property, nor any lien, obligation, covenant, limitation or encumbrance of any kind presently precludes the imposition of the restrictions, covenants and obligations of this Amended Declaration or the development of the Subject Property in accordance therewith.\par
\b NOW, THEREFORE\b0 , Declarant does hereby declare that the Subject Property shall be held, sold, conveyed and occupied subject to the following restrictions, covenants and obligations which are for the purpose of protecting the value and desirability of the Subject Property and which shall be binding on all heirs, successors, legal representatives, mortgagees in possession and assigns, and shall run with such real property.\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-360\li720\sa240\sl360\slmult1 1.\tab All capitalized terms used herein not defined in this Amended Declaration shall have the meaning ascribed to such terms in the Declaration. \par
2.\tab\ul Section 1.09\ulnone  of the Declaration is hereby deleted in its entirety.\par
3.\tab\ul Section 1.10\ulnone  of the Declaration is hereby deleted in its entirety.\par
4.\tab\ul Section 1.11\ulnone  of the Declaration is hereby deleted in its entirety.\par
5.\tab\ul Section 2.03\ulnone  of the Declaration is hereby deleted in its entirety and replaced with the following: \ldblquote Use of the Industrial Space consistent with the underlying zoning use regulations shall be permitted, except\uldb provided\ulnone  that \uldb (i)\ulnone  use of the Industrial Space as an eating and drinking establishment with dancing (i.e., night club) shall be prohibited.\rdblquote  \uldb , (ii) no more than 5,000 zoning square feet within the area indicated as \ldblquote Anticipated Restaurant/Retail\rdblquote  on the Restaurant Space Diagram attached hereto as Exhibit C may be operated as an eating and drinking establishment (without dancing) (a \ldblquote Restaurant\rdblquote ), (iii) the Restaurant shall contain no more than a total of 220 table seats and/or bar stools, combined, and (y) food and beverage service in the Restaurant shall end by 12:00 a.m. each day.\rdblquote\ulnone\par
6.\tab\ul Section 2.04\ulnone  of the Declaration is hereby deleted in its entirety and replaced with the following:  \ldblquote The provisions of Section 2.01 shall not impose any obligation on the Declarant to construct any new or rehabilitated building on the Subject Property pursuant to the Rezoning Application.  If such new or rehabilitated building is not developed, Declarant shall have no obligation to comply with the provisions of Section 2.01.\rdblquote\par
7.\tab\ul Section 4.11\ulnone  of the Declaration is hereby deleted in its entirety and replaced with the following:  \ldblquote All notices, demands, requests or other communications which may be or are permitted, desirable or required to be given and sent: if intended for Declarant, by mailing to Declarant at its address given in this Agreement, ATTN: Jon McMillan, with copies to Fried, Frank, Harris, Shriver and Jacobson, LLP, One New York Plaza, New York, New York 10004, ATTN: Carol E. Rosenthal and to the holder of any mortgage on the Subject Property who has given CPC notice: of its name and address and has requested that it receive such copy; and if intended for the City or CPC, by mailing to CPC at 120 Broadway, New York, New York 10271, ATTN: Chairperson.  Any change in the above addresses shall be given within thirty (30) days of such change.  Each notice, demand, request or other communication which shall be mailed shall be deemed sufficiently given, secured or sent for all purposes hereunder three days (if mailed in New York City) or five days (if mailed outside of New York City) after it shall be mailed by United States registered or certified mail at a branch post office regularly maintained by the United States Postal Service.\rdblquote\par
8.\tab\ldblquote Exhibit C\rdblquote  and\uldb to the Declaration is hereby deleted and replaced with the diagram attached as Exhibit D to this Amended Declaration.  \ulnone\ldblquote Exhibit D\rdblquote  to the Declaration are\uldb is\ulnone  hereby deleted in their\uldb its\ulnone  entirety.  \par
9.\tab Declarant shall file and record this Amended Declaration in the Office of the Register of the City of New York, County of New York, indexing it against the Subject Property immediately following the date hereof.  Declarant will promptly deliver to CPC a true copy of this Amended Declaration as recorded and certified by the Register.  If Declarant fails to so record this Amended Declaration, the City may record this Amended Declaration at the sole cost and expense of the Declarant, who shall immediately pay such costs to the City.\par
10.\tab Except as amended by the provisions of this Amended Declaration, all of the provisions of the Declaration shall continue in full force and effect.\par
